name: BSO
comment:
>>37740992
>>37741014
>>37741027

Vision hasn't stopped shooting since he first opened fire, blasting off chunks of exoskeleton and blue-grey flesh. Tatsumaki's still pounding away at it, and doesn't notice that it's turned to face her until too late. It dives forward, shattering her guard and throwing her to the ground several feet away.

> Nel defeated crawler. [[ Party: Vision, Tatsumaki, Ascheritte ]]

There's one name fewer on your list. Nel hasn't stopped shouting, and you can barely understand him now.

You give a battle cry, driving your blade deep and charging the length of the creature's body, dragging a jagged scar along the length of its side. Then, it turns to you, partly shifting its attention, partly thrown wide by another salvo of Vision's attacks.

It charges, mandibles spread wide, but you're ready this time, taking a wide slash upward through the roof of its gaping maw.

> Ascheritte defeated giant crawler. [[ Party: Vision, Tatsumaki, Nel ]]

The cave falls silent, the sounds of skittering and burrowing growing more distant.

What will you do?
> Other
